Sentencas: In previous reports, flowing CO2 at the cathode is essential for either conventional molten carbonate fuel cells (MCFCs) based on molten carbonate/LiAlO2 electrolytes or matrix-free MCFCs.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: For the first time, we demonstrate a high-performance matrix-free MCFC without CO2 recirculation.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, power densities of 430 and 410 mW/cm(2) are achieved when biomass-bamboo charcoal and wood, respectively-is used as fuel.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: At 600 degrees C, a stable performance is observed during the measured 90 hours after the initial degradation.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: In this MCFC, CO2 is produced at the anode when carbon-containing fuels are used.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: The produced CO2 then dissolves and diffuses to the cathode to react with oxygen in open air, forming the required CO23 or CO42 ions for continuous operation.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation
A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: ions may also take part in the cell reactions.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation

Sentencas: This provides a simple new fuel cell technology to directly convert carbon-containing fuels such as carbon and biomass into electricity with high efficiency.
Titulo: A simple high-performance matrix-free biomass molten carbonate fuel cell without CO2 recirculation
